ingredients: 1 (28 ounce) can whole tomatoes, undrained and quartered
instructions: Cook macaroni according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, brown beef; drain. Add tomatoes, tomato sauce, gravy, onion and garlic powder. Drain macaroni; add to beef mixture and mix well. Transfer to a greased shallow 3-qt. baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until heated through.
title: Hamburger Hot Dish
